00008 CTank::CTank(CMap *p_map, Uint32 x, Uint32 y,
00009   std::vector<CPlayer>& Player, std::vector<CObject*>& Object,
00010   object_t objtype) :
00011 CObject(p_map, x, y, objtype),
00012 m_Player(Player),
00013 m_Object(Object)
00014 {
00015  m_type = OBJ_TANK;
00016  hardmode = (mp_Map->m_Difficulty>1);
00017  state = TANK_WALK;
00018  movedir = RIGHT;
00019  animtimer = 0;
00020  frame = 0;
00021  timer = 0;
00022  ponsameleveltime = 0;
00023  alreadyfiredcauseonsamelevel = 0;
00024  dist_to_travel = TANK_MAXTRAVELDIST;
00025  canbezapped = true;  // will stop bullets but are not harmed
00026  m_invincible = true;
00027  m_canturnaround = true;
00028 }
00029 
00030 void CTank::process()
00031 {
00032  switch(state)
00033  {
00034  case TANK_WALK: // Walk in a direction
00035  {
00036   // is keen on same level?
00037   if (movedir==LEFT)
00038   {  // move left
00039    sprite = TANK_WALK_LEFT_FRAME + frame;
00040    xinertia = -TANK_WALK_SPEED;
00041    if( blockedl )
00042    {
00043     movedir = RIGHT;
00044     frame = 0;
00045     timer = 0;
00046     animtimer = 0;
00047     state = TANK_TURN;
00048    }
00049 
00050    dist_to_travel--;
00051   }
00052   else
00053   {  // move right
00054    sprite = TANK_WALK_RIGHT_FRAME + frame;
00055    xinertia = TANK_WALK_SPEED;
00056    if ( blockedr )
00057    {
00058     movedir = LEFT;
00059     frame = 0;
00060     timer = 0;
00061     animtimer = 0;
00062     state = TANK_TURN;
00063    }
00064 
00065    dist_to_travel--;
00066   }
00067 
00068   // walk animation
00069   if (animtimer > TANK_WALK_ANIM_TIME)
00070   {
00071    if (frame>=3) frame=0;
00072    else frame++;
00073    animtimer = 0;
00074   } else animtimer++;
00075 
00076   if(dist_to_travel==0)
00077   {
00078    frame = 0;
00079    timer = 0;
00080    animtimer = 0;
00081    state = TANK_WAIT;
00082   }
00083  default: break;
00084  }
00085  break;
00086 
00087  case TANK_WAIT:
00088   if ( (timer > TANK_PREPAREFIRE_TIME) ||
00089     (timer > TANK_PREPAREFIRE_TIME_FAST && hardmode) )
00090   {
00091    timer = 0;
00092    state = TANK_FIRE;
00093   }
00094   else
00095    timer++;
00096 
00097   break;
00098 
00099  case TANK_TURN:
00100   // If it gets stuck somewhere turn around
00101   sprite = TANK_LOOK_FRAME + frame;
00102   // animation
00103   if (animtimer > TANK_LOOK_ANIM_TIME)
00104   {
00105    frame ^= 1;
00106    animtimer = 0;
00107   } else animtimer++;
00108 
00109   // when time is up go back to moving
00110   if (timer > TANK_LOOK_TOTALTIME)
00111   {
00112    // decide what direction to go
00113    state = TANK_WALK;
00114    animtimer = 0;
00115    timer = 0;
00116   } else timer++;
00117   break;
00118  case TANK_FIRE:
00119  {
00120   int height_top = g_pBehaviorEngine->getPhysicsSettings().tankbot.shot_height_from_top<<STC;
00121   if(height_top!=0)
00122   {
00123    CRay *newobject;
00124    if (onscreen) g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_TANK_FIRE, PLAY_NOW, scrx);
00125    if (movedir==RIGHT)
00126     newobject = new CRay(mp_Map, getXMidPos(), getYUpPos()+height_top, RIGHT);
00127    else
00128     newobject = new CRay(mp_Map, getXMidPos(), getYUpPos()+height_top, LEFT);
00129    newobject->setOwner(OBJ_TANK, m_index);
00130    newobject->setSpeed(108);
00131    newobject->sprite = ENEMYRAY;
00132    newobject->canbezapped = true;
00133    m_Object.push_back(newobject);
00134   }
00135 
00136   state = TANK_WAIT_LOOK;
00137   frame = 0;
00138   timer = 0;
00139   animtimer = 0;
00140   dist_to_travel = TANK_MINTRAVELDIST + (rnd()%10)*(TANK_MAXTRAVELDIST-TANK_MINTRAVELDIST)/10;
00141  }
00142  break;
00143 
00144  case TANK_WAIT_LOOK:
00145   // Happens after Robot has fired
00146   if ( timer > TANK_WAITAFTER_FIRE )
00147   {
00148    timer = 0;
00149    state = TANK_LOOK;
00150   }
00151   else
00152    timer++;
00153 
00154   break;
00155 
00156  case TANK_LOOK:
00157   sprite = TANK_LOOK_FRAME + frame;
00158   // animation
00159   if (animtimer > TANK_LOOK_ANIM_TIME)
00160   {
00161    frame ^= 1;
00162    animtimer = 0;
00163   } else animtimer++;
00164 
00165   // when time is up go back to moving
00166   if (timer > TANK_LOOK_TOTALTIME)
00167   {
00168    // decide what direction to go
00169 
00170    if(m_Player[0].getXMidPos() < getXMidPos())
00171    {
00172     movedir = LEFT;
00173     sprite = TANK_WALK_LEFT_FRAME;
00174    }
00175    else if(m_Player[0].getXMidPos() > getXMidPos())
00176    {
00177     movedir = RIGHT;
00178     sprite = TANK_WALK_RIGHT_FRAME;
00179    }
00180    state = TANK_WALK;
00181    animtimer = 0;
00182    timer = 0;
00183   } else timer++;
00184   break;
00185  }
00186 }
00187 
00188 void CTank::getTouchedBy(CObject &theObject)
00189 {   // push keen
00190  if(hitdetect(theObject))
00191  {
00192   if( theObject.m_type == OBJ_PLAYER )
00193   {
00194    CPlayer &Player = dynamic_cast<CPlayer&>(theObject);
00195    Player.bump( *this, movedir );
00196   }
00197  }
00198 }
